body.p:
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
Against } Indictment December term 1863
John W. Bush

The Grand Jury of Lyon County, in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, accuse John W. Bush of the crime of Manslaughter committed as follows, Viz; The Said John W. Bush on the 15th day of August 1863, in the County aforesaid did, feloniously and wilfully kill Richard T. Harris by shooting him the Said Harris with a Pistol loaded with a leaden bullet or other hard Substance, against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

B.C. Ballard
Foreman Grand Jury
E. P. Campbell Attorney for Commonwealth
